docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, May 8 (AP by Mail) -- News censorship has erupted in neighboring Argentina in acute form. Like most censorships, the Argentine variety is baffling to those compelled to deal with it.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, May 8 (AP by Mail) -- News censorship has erupted in neighboring Argentina in acute form. Like most censorships, the Argentine variety is baffling to those compelled to deal with it.
docs.abstract: Argentine censorship reptd rigid and baffling

headline.main: ARGENTINE CENSORS BAFFLE AMERICANS; Correspondents Cited for Infractions Are Unable to Get Details of Offenses

docs.snippet: THE All-American Highway, though it still has gaps in its projected majestic sweep from the Arctic Circle to the region of Cape Horn, is already serving in the war -- and one link, that built by the Army in Alaska was built specifically for war.
docs.lead_paragraph: THE All-American Highway, though it still has gaps in its projected majestic sweep from the Arctic Circle to the region of Cape Horn, is already serving in the war -- and one link, that built by the Army in Alaska was built specifically for war.
docs.abstract: Completion plans; use for war traffic discussed

headline.main: GREAT HIGHWAY AIDS IN WAR; All-American Route Is Already in Use to Relieve Shipping

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, May 22 (AP) -- Workers' representatives in Buenos Aires and elsewhere tended to agree that dissolution of the Com-intern would contribute to the consolidation of Leftist elements that have been divided in the past over the Communists'...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, May 22 (AP) -- Workers' representatives in Buenos Aires and elsewhere tended to agree that dissolution of the Com-intern would contribute to the consolidation of Leftist elements that have been divided in the past over the Communists' presumed subservience to Moscow.

docs.snippet: Although the new decentralization plan for the control of exports to Latin America has been criticized by many foreign traders here, "the vast majority of the merchants in South America look hopefully and with favor on the plan," Franklin Johnston,...
docs.lead_paragraph: Although the new decentralization plan for the control of exports to Latin America has been criticized by many foreign traders here, "the vast majority of the merchants in South America look hopefully and with favor on the plan," Franklin Johnston, publisher of The American Exporter, declared yesterday at a meeting of the Export Managers Club at the Hotel Pennsylvania.

headline.main: LATIN TRADERS LIKE NEW CONTROL PLAN; For Decentralization Program as Ending the 'Fly-by-Night' Firms, Johnston Says WOULD LIMIT ITS SCOPE Export Club Told Rules Should Apply Only to Articles in Short Supply

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, June 4 -- General Arturo Rawson, partner with General Pedro Ramirez in Argentina's military coup d'etat, took possession of the Government House, the Casa Rosada, while President Ramon Castillo was making a futile plea for assistance...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, June 4 -- General Arturo Rawson, partner with General Pedro Ramirez in Argentina's military coup d'etat, took possession of the Government House, the Casa Rosada, while President Ramon Castillo was making a futile plea for assistance from his First Field Artillery Regiment, it was learned tonight.

headline.main: Army Marches Into Buenos Aires After Spurning Plea by Castillo

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, June 4 -- Revolting Argentine Army leaders drove isolationist President Ramon S. Castillo and his Cabinet into exile today and invoked martial law throughout the country after their quick seizure of power.
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, June 4 -- Revolting Argentine Army leaders drove isolationist President Ramon S. Castillo and his Cabinet into exile today and invoked martial law throughout the country after their quick seizure of power.
docs.abstract: Revolt: army leaders, headed by War Min Ramirez and Gen Rawson, drive Castillo and Cabinet into exile; Rawson decrees martial law; Castillo sets up govt on warship Drummond; Min Ruiz Guinazu reptd joining Castillo on ship, leaving family at Chilean Embassy; Cabinet members leave ship for evening, Uruguay; return to ship; sail for unknown destination; mil leaders conf; Rawson issues proclamation; illus

headline.main: MILITARY IN POWER; Pro-Allied General Is in Lead on the Committee Taking Over Country
